diff_user.system:
You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. Your task is to create a Python program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: University. The program should implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

Predicate: city - Example triple: (1 Decembrie 1918 University | city | Alba Iulia)
Predicate: country - Example triple: (1 Decembrie 1918 University | country | Romania)
Predicate: latinName - Example triple: (1 Decembrie 1918 University | latinName | "Universitas Apulensis")
Predicate: nickname - Example triple: (1 Decembrie 1918 University | nickname | Uab)
Predicate: rector - Example triple: (1 Decembrie 1918 University | rector | "Breaz Valer Daniel")
Predicate: academicStaffSize - Example triple: (AWH Engineering College | academicStaffSize | 250)
Predicate: established - Example triple: (AWH Engineering College | established | 2001)
Predicate: state - Example triple: (AWH Engineering College | state | Kerala)
Predicate: governmentType - Example triple: (Aarhus | governmentType | Magistrate)
Predicate: hasToItsNortheast - Example triple: (Aarhus | hasToItsNortheast | Mols)
Predicate: dean - Example triple: (Accademia di Architettura di Mendrisio | dean | Mario Botta)
Predicate: location - Example triple: (Accademia di Architettura di Mendrisio | location | Ticino)
Predicate: numberOfStudents - Example triple: (Accademia di Architettura di Mendrisio | numberOfStudents | 600)
Predicate: affiliation - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | affiliation | Visvesvaraya Technological University)
Predicate: director - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | director | "Dr. G. P. Prabhukumar")
Predicate: motto - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | motto | "Nurturing Excellence")
Predicate: numberOfPostgraduateStudents - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | numberOfPostgraduateStudents | 700)
Predicate: numberOfUndergraduateStudents - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | numberOfUndergraduateStudents | 10000)
Predicate: officialSchoolColour - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | officialSchoolColour | "Blue, White and Orange")
Predicate: outlookRanking - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | outlookRanking | 63)
Predicate: sportsOffered - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | sportsOffered | Tennis)
Predicate: wasGivenTheTechnicalCampusStatusBy - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | wasGivenTheTechnicalCampusStatusBy | All India Council for Technical Education)
Predicate: founder - Example triple: (Bangalore | founder | Kempe Gowda I)
Predicate: leader - Example triple: (Denmark | leader | Lars Løkke Rasmussen)
Predicate: leaderTitle - Example triple: (Denmark | leaderTitle | Monarchy of Denmark)
Predicate: religion - Example triple: (Denmark | religion | Church of Denmark)
Predicate: headquarter - Example triple: (European University Association | headquarter | Brussels)
Predicate: largestCity - Example triple: (India | largestCity | Mumbai)
Predicate: river - Example triple: (India | river | Ganges)
Predicate: hasToItsWest - Example triple: (Karnataka | hasToItsWest | Arabian Sea)
Predicate: anthem - Example triple: (Romania | anthem | Deșteaptă-te, române!)
Predicate: ethnicGroup - Example triple: (Romania | ethnicGroup | Germans of Romania)
Predicate: legislature - Example triple: (Switzerland | legislature | Federal Assembly (Switzerland))
Predicate: sportGoverningBody - Example triple: (Tennis | sportGoverningBody | International Tennis Federation)
Predicate: isPartOf - Example triple: (Alba Iulia | isPartOf | Alba County)
Predicate: neighboringMunicipality - Example triple: (Mendrisio | neighboringMunicipality | Meride)
Predicate: capital - Example triple: (Romania | capital | Bucharest)
Predicate: patronSaint - Example triple: (Romania | patronSaint | Andrew the Apostle)
Predicate: hasToItsNorthwest - Example triple: (Kerala | hasToItsNorthwest | Mahé, India)
Predicate: campus - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | campus | "In Soldevanahalli, Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore – 560090.")
Predicate: president - Example triple: (Acharya Institute of Technology | president | "B.M. Reddy")
Predicate: staff - Example triple: (University of Burgundy | staff | 2900)
Predicate: numberOfDoctoralStudents - Example triple: (University of Burgundy | numberOfDoctoralStudents | 1299)
Predicate: elevationAboveTheSeaLevel - Example triple: (Dijon | elevationAboveTheSeaLevel | 245.0)
Predicate: postalCode - Example triple: (Dijon | postalCode | 21000)
Predicate: longName - Example triple: (France | longName | "French Republic")
